page.title: 17HOUSING
page.content: My name is James Dunning.I am 7 years old.I live in Warmsworth Doncaster.I live in a new four bedroom detached house. My house was built a few years ago on some old farmers fields that the farmer rented to grow corn on.The land was Known as the corn fields.Before we moved to Balby we lived in Hexthorpe.When we first moved in there were only a couple of houses.Now there are,198 new houses built around my school.They were built by Mcleans Homes and Hallgate Homes.The houses are detached and semi detached and the bungalows are all detached.The steets are all cul de sacs and the front gardens do not have walls and fences,they are open plan. Now nearly all the houses are finished we have had 41 new children start our school who live on the new estate.
